title: Refactor z-index values in EditIcon and SchematicViewer components
description: Refactor z-index values in EditIcon and SchematicViewer components

title: remove circuit-to-svg package (causing issue in dependendant packages)
description: Remove the "circuit-to-svg" package as it is causing issues in dependent packages.

title: updated schematic_box type
description: Update the `schematic_box` type to include a new `is_dashed` property.

title: ninePointAnchor for silkscreen text
description: Replaces the `anchor_alignment` field in the `pcb_silkscreen_text` type with a new type called `NinePointAnchor`.

title: Updated schematic-box props
description: Added new properties to the `schematic-box` component, including `padding`, `title`, `overlay`, and `strokeStyle`.

title: nine_point_anchor for silkscreen text
description: Adds support for nine-point anchoring of silkscreen text

title: add nosquareplating flag support in pinrow
description: Add support for the `nosquareplating` flag in the `pinrow` function, which allows for a circular pad to be used for the first pin instead of a rectangular pad.

title: updated circuit-to-svg and ss
description: Updated the `circuit-to-svg` and `ss` packages

title: Apply SPONSORSHIP_MULTIPLIER (1.25) to sponsorship amount calculations
description: Apply a 1.25 multiplier to the sponsorship amount calculations.

title: support nine point anchor alignment for silkscreen texts
description: Adds support for nine-point anchor alignment for silkscreen texts

title: updated dep
description: Update dependency version for "@tscircuit/core"

title: updated deps and snapshots
description: Updated dependencies and snapshots

title: missing typecheck workflow
description: Adds a GitHub workflow to perform type checking using Bun for the repository.

title: add some important workflows
description: Add GitHub Actions workflows for format checking, testing, and publishing to npm

title: Update terminology in QuickstartPage to reflect package usage instead of snippets
description: Update terminology in QuickstartPage to reflect package usage instead of snippets

title: chore: update runframe (report button issue fix)
description: Update runframe package to fix report button issue

title: removing 3d-viewer as it's redudant package
fix error not being shown on first run
description: Fix an issue where an error is not being shown on the first run.

title: fix: important file preview not updating
description: Fixes a bug where the important file preview doesn't update when the list of important files changes.

title: Make code editor interactive before full type checking is ready
description: Make the code editor interactive before full type checking is ready.

title: Invalidate cache after delete and update runframe
description: Invalidates the cache after deleting or updating a package in the runframe.

title: cleanup `/preview` page
description: Removes the `/preview` page from the application.

title: fix `cmd + k` search which showed the same packages multiple times
description: Fix the `cmd + k` search functionality to show unique packages instead of duplicates.

title: add copy core versions in postinstall (sync dependency versions with core)
description: Add a script to copy core dependency versions to the current package.json file during postinstall.

title: add fallback file entrypoint to the report issue button
description: Add a fallback file entrypoint to the report issue button

title: fix: report issue button having missing circuit code
description: Fixed the issue where the "Report issue" button was missing the circuit code.

title: update packages
description: Updating dependencies, including adding the `@tscircuit/footprinter` package and updating versions of `@tscircuit/pcb-viewer`, `circuit-to-svg`, and `schematic-symbols`.

title: Fix: Display errors correctly on first run failure
description: Fixes a bug where the "Errors" tab fails to display error details on the first run failure.

title: chore: file-server
description: Update the version of the `@tscircuit/file-server` dependency from `0.0.23` to `0.0.24`.

title: chore: easyeda update
description: Update the `easyeda` dependency to version `0.0.142`

title: Fix: importing jlcpcb parts not being added to the file system
description: Fix issue with importing JLCPCB parts not being added to the file system

title: fix: upgrade command
description: Fix the `upgrade` command to correctly check for and update the CLI to the latest version.

title: fix packages import from the dialog
description: Fix packages import from the dialog

title: chore: runframe update
description: Update the `@tscircuit/runframe` dependency to version `0.0.481`

title: Add support for HTTP/2
description: Add support for HTTP/2 by setting the "authority" header in addition to the "Host" header.

title: Matching and scoring system, better grid stringification
description: Adds a matching and scoring system for circuit boards, along with a better grid stringification feature.

title: Template Adaptation
description: The change adds new types for various edit operations, such as adding labels to pins, adding pins to sides, removing pins from sides, adding passives to pins, clearing pins, and removing chips. It also adds a function to adapt a template circuit to a target netlist by applying these edit operations.

title: Complex tscircuit-based layouts, normalization fixes, apply and get net lists from Circuit JSON
description: Introduces complex tscircuit-based layouts, normalization fixes, and the ability to apply and get net lists from Circuit JSON.
